## ContentExplorerNodeData interface

Basic data contained in a Content Explorer hierarchy node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ContentExplorerNodeData
```

## Properties

| Property                                                 | Modifiers | Type   | Description            |
| -------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------ | ---------------------- |
| [nodeId](./extensions.contentexplorernodedata.nodeid.md) |           | string | Unique ID of the node. |
